scripts.run:exporter: lambda-local -l dist/exporter.js -e test/exporter.json -h handler -P ~/.aws/credentials -p membership -r eu-west-1 -t 30 -E {\"Stage\":\"CODE\"}
scripts.run:querier: lambda-local -l dist/querier.js -e test/querier.json -h handler -P ~/.aws/credentials -p membership -r eu-west-1 -t 30 -E {\"Stage\":\"CODE\"}
scripts.run:fetcher: lambda-local -l dist/fetcher.js -e test/fetcher.json -h handler -P ~/.aws/credentials -p membership -r eu-west-1 -t 30 -E {\"Stage\":\"CODE\"}
scripts.run:sf: lambda-local -l dist/salesfetch.js -e test/fetcher.json -h handler -P ~/.aws/credentials -p membership -r eu-west-1 -t 30 -E {\"Stage\":\"CODE\"}
